content: Hi folks! I offer my editing service of any kind of file  For what you needed   If you need correct a data  Update due date  Or make of zeroYou can contact here or telegram https://t.me/Otra_Cuenta_Mas@Otra_Cuenta_Mas

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: You are speaking in general, which may contain a significant lack of specific ability or previous experience.Ask the skills that you can provide in detail such as what files or data you are talking about, and what kind of modifications you can do.Adding your portfolio with the recent things you did would be amazing.If you accept payment in bitcoins,here is suitable, otherwise move your topic to https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=197.0 board.Make all things public, you will find some people do not prefer to communicate on Telegram until after the start of the deal here.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP you have been earlier advised to be specific in the files you can conveniently work on so as not cast any doubt with respect to your services. As i see not mentioning specific areas are signs of lapses though and your update or introduction is kind of empty rather. It would be in your own best interest to do as you have been advised so that members here willing to engage your services would not be much bothered about wanting to go through the stress of detailing or specially putting up things to do.Do you not have past work or portfolio to present so we could see your past records and performance because that would give you  a good edge and stand on this platform if you must scale through.

comments.author: MisterEdit900
comments.body: I edit basically any file, photo or image that someone needs, if someone needs an editor they can come and ask, I gladly clarify doubts and say if I can do it or not.
